name: Battle Academy: Operation Market Garden
storyline: After fighting some of the most iconic moments of World War II, it’s time again to use all your tactical skills to capture Arnhem bridge and secure a crucial victory against the Germans in one of the most complex and articulated battles ever fought. In September 1944, the Allies launch Operation Market Garden, the daring attempt to capture the crucial bridges of the Netherlands and open a way into Germany. Airborne troops drop behind enemy lines to secure the crossings while British tanks race to reach them.
